+ // Enhanced Button Component with asChild support using RADIX Slot
+ interface RadixButtonProps extends React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement> {
+   asChild?: boolean;
+   variant?: 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'danger';
+   size?: 'small' | 'medium' | 'large';
+ }

+   asChild = false, 
+   variant = 'primary', 
+   size = 'medium', 
+   children, 
+   style,
+   ...props
